name: Death to Spies
notes: * In Steam settings / "Steam Play": tick each checkbox and select the latest Proton version. * This version won't play intro video (credits). * Enable Vsync to avoid mouse glitching on menu items.
content:
game:
  appid: 9800
installer:
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/videos" & mv "$GAMEDIR/intro_1.vid" "$GAMEDIR/intro_2.vid"
      "$GAMEDIR/intro_3.vid" "$GAMEDIR/videos"
    description: moving non-playable video files
